channel.title: [VFM] Mountainous 15er - Town wins!
channel.description:
# Welcome to Mountainous FM, hosted by @Arete and @SirDerpsAlot with @Jane as VC-bot!
# Rules:
Follow the Global Forum Rules, given in this post:
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926
Additionally, for this game, a minimum requirement of **10 substantive, on-topic, game related posts** per in game day are required. Posts that are explicitly or obviously made solely for the purpose of meeting this requirement do not count towards the minimum, nor do posts containing *solely* a vote. Players who fail to meet this requirement may be replaced out.
The game will begin on December 13th.
# Role List
[color = ligreen] Vanilla Townie [/color] [color = ligreen] Vanilla Townie [/color] [color = ligreen] Vanilla Townie [/color] [color = ligreen] Vanilla Townie [/color] [color = ligreen] Vanilla Townie [/color] [color = ligreen] Vanilla Townie [/color] [color = ligreen] Vanilla Townie [/color] [color = ligreen] Vanilla Townie [/color] [color = ligreen] Vanilla Townie [/color] [color = ligreen] Vanilla Townie [/color] [color = ligreen] Vanilla Townie [/color] [color = ligreen] Vanilla Townie [/color] [color = red] Mafia Goon [/color] [color = red] Mafia Goon [/color] [color = red] Mafia Goon [/color]
Sample role PMs:
[details="Summary"] > # [color = ligreen] Mount Everest, Vanilla Townie [/color] > > You are a Vanilla Townie. Your only weapons are your voice and your vote. > > *Defeat the Mafia.*
> # [color = red] Mount Everest, Mafia Goon [/color] > > You are a Mafia Goon. You share a 24/7 private chat with your fellow members of the Mafia. Each night, the Mafia must kill a player outside your faction. > > *Reach parity with the town.* [/details]
# Gameplay
- The set-up is a standard 15 player Mountainous set-up with 12 town and 3 Mafia.
- Days are 36 hours unless majority is reached early and nights are 12 hours.
- Lynches are majority and plurality. In cases of a tie, the lynch will be determined randomly among the players receiving the most votes.
- No-lynch is a valid vote, and may be hammered to end the day early. In cases where no-lynch and another vote are tied at the end of the day, no-lynch will have priority in the rand.
- Self-votes are considered valid votes.
- Votes are locked in MyLo and LyLo scenarios. That is to say, in situations where a mislynch or a no-lynch will guarantee a Mafia victory, the first vote cast by a given player is final and cannot be changed.
- All votes must be in the form **/vote [name of player]** to be considered valid, and all unvotes must be in the form **/unvote**. This is to enable the smooth processing of votes.
- The Mafia factional kill is mandatory. If no factional kill is submitted, the kill will be determined randomly from among living members of the town.
- The Mafia will communicate through a private Discord server or forum topic.
# Player List:
1. <s>JakeTheWolfie</s> - **Lynched D2 - [color = ligreen] Beenkeragh, Vanilla Townie[/color]** 2. <s>Marshal</s> - **Died N6 - [color = ligreen]Baltoro Kangri, Vanilla Townie[/color]** 3. <s>WazzaAzza</s> <s>Tangeld</s> - **Lynched D7 - [color = red]Makalu, Mafia Goon[/color]** 4. <s>Nuclear_Rehab</s> - **Died N2 - [color = ligreen] Kanjiroba, Vanilla Townie[/color]** 5. <s>Kai_5</s> - **Lynched D1 - [color = ligreen] Denali, Vanilla Townie[/color]** 6. <s>Chloe</s> <s>Sulit</s> <s>Htm</s> - **Died N4 - [color = ligreen] Mount Rausu, Vanilla Townie [/color]** 7. Katze 8. <s>Priestess and Mercenary</s> - **Lynched D6 - [color = ligreen] Waialeale, Vanilla Townie [/color]** 9. <s>Italy</s> - **Lynched D5 - [color = red] Kirkjufell, Mafia Goon[/color]** 10. <s>Emilia</s> <s>Mist1422</s> - **Lynched D3 - [color = red] Huangshan Mountain, Mafia Goon[/color]** 11. <s>Jeremy_Gonzalez</s> DatBird 12. <s>Luxy</s> <s>and Geyde</s> - **Died N3 - [color = ligreen] Khan Tengri, Vanilla Townie [/color]** 13. <s>Isaac_Gonzalez</s> <s>Possessed</s> - **Lynched D4 - [color = ligreen] Mount Fuji, Vanilla Townie [/color]** 14. <s>Hippolytus</s> - **Died N5 - [color = ligreen] Bárðarbunga, Vanilla Townie [/color]** 15. <s>Icibalus</s> - **Died N1 - [color = ligreen]Mount Vesuvius, Vanilla Townie[/color]**
**Backups:** 1. DatBird (N2+) 2. Mist1422 3. Maxwell (Dec. 26+) 4. Sulit
**Spectators:** 1. Astand 3. Jgoesgaming 3. Shurian 4. Andrej # Milestones:
[End of Day 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-mountainous-15er-14-15/79786/1422) [End of Day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-mountainous-15er-11-15/79786/2328) [End of Day 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-mountainous-15er-day-4-9-15-looking-for-a-replacement/79786/2747) [End of Day 4](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-mountainous-15er-night-4-8-15/79786/4171) [End of Day 5](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-mountainous-15er-night-5-6-15/79786/4596) [End of Day 6](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-mountainous-15er-night-6-4-15/79786/5126) [End of Day 7](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/vfm-mountainous-15er-town-wins/79786/5314)

item.title: [VFM] Mountainous 15er - Town wins!
item.dc:creator: Nuclear_Rehab
item.description:
Nuclear_Rehab:

Okay so let’s take a look at who I am fairly sure is town. Out of the following 13, I will bold my town.

Jake
Marshal
Tangled
Nuclear
Katze
Sulit
Priestess
Italy
Mist
Jeremy
Luxy
Isaac
Hippo

So let’s say my poe is at Hippo/Mist/Italy/Sulit/Katze/Jake/Tangled.

In my following post I will say why this POE leaves me to believe Jake is town based in my world

Nuclear_Rehab:
Jane:

Vote Count

Votee Voted by Votes
Luxy and Geyde Jeremy_Gonzalez, Hippolytus, Mist1422 3/8
Chloe Isaac_Gonzalez 1/8
Mist1422 Chloe, Marshal 2/8
JakeTheWolfie Icibalus, Kai_5, Priestess and Mercenary, Nuclear_Rehab 4/8
Kai_5 Luxy and Geyde, JakeTheWolfie, Katze, Italy 4/8
Currently Abstaining Players WazzaAzza 1

Hippo/Mist/Italy/Sulit/Katze/Jake/Tangled Taking a look at my POE given the vote day one.

Jake is tied with Kai. If he is mafia, himself and his 2 partners would like to save him if possible. Then let us take my POE and see where they are voting.

Hippo on Luxy, off the main counter wagon to Jake.

Mist on Luxy, off the main counter wagon.

Sulit off maincounter wagon.

Italy, does vote on the counter wagon.

Katze, does vote on the counter wagon.

Tangled, his slot no votes.

So I take a look at this and my conclusion would be that very few of my POE reads are even caring about whether Jake or Kai gets lynched. Only Italy/Katze are choosing a side there, and that would be the possible world where Jake/ITaly/Katze are the mafia. Though I liked how Jake was talking to Katze earlier, and I don’t see them being partners.

When you also take into accord the low activity at EOD, wolves probably had no threat of death EOD1.

Conclusion being Jake is town, and I have mafia inside the rest of my POE.

Did well enough

Read full topic
